material:
CERTIFICATE OF AMENDMENT OF



CERTIFICATE OF INCORPORATION



OF COPART, INC.



Copart, Inc., a Delaware corporation (the “Corporation”), does hereby certify

that:



1.The name of the Corporation is Copart, Inc. The Corporation’s original

Certificate of Incorporation was filed with the Secretary of State of the

State of Delaware on January 6, 2012.



  



2.The following amendment to the Corporation’s Certificate of Incorporation

(the “Certificate of Incorporation”) has been duly adopted in accordance with

the applicable provisions of Section 242 of the General Corporation Law of the

State of Delaware by the Board of Directors and the stockholders of the

corporation.



  



3.Article IX of the Certificate of Incorporation shall be amended and restated

in its entirety to read as follows:



“ARTICLE IX



Reserved.”



  



IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the Corporation has caused this Certificate of Amendment

to be signed by its duly authorized officer this __th day of December, 2016,

and the foregoing facts stated herein are true and correct.



  



By:______________________________



Name:

completion.reason: There is no mention or indication in the provided material that the charter of Copart, Inc. includes a provision exculpating directors from monetary liability for breach of fiduciary duty of care (a '102b7' waiver).
